definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The latest example of neutrinos’ weirdness comes from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本最近有个例子能够证明中微子的怪异。

sentences.english: After the lepton era, its number density would be higher than that of baryon by a factor of about 109.
sentences.chinese: 中微子是唯一的始终可与光子数密度相比拟的粒子。

sentences.english: At least, in weak interaction, neutrinos may be superluminal particles.
sentences.chinese: 至少在弱相互作用中，中微子可能是超光速粒子。

sentences.english: , an underground science lab specializing in neutrino and dark matter physics.
sentences.chinese: 这个实验室位于地下，专门研究暗物质与中微子物理。

sentences.english: So if the neutrinos are pulling this fast one on Einstein, how can it happen?
sentences.chinese: 那么如果中微子有这么快，它又是怎么发生的呢？

sentences.english: Unfortunately, neutrinos' immutability also makes them rather difficult to detect.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，中微子的稳定性也使得它非常难以被探测到。

sentences.english: The calculation from the neutrino work yields 20 terawatts for uranium and thorium.
sentences.chinese: 从中微子工作计算出铀和钍约产出20太瓦。

sentences.english: The intriguing results indicate a new property of the enigmatic particles known as neutrinos.
sentences.chinese: 这个有趣的结果指出神秘粒子的新属性被称作中微子。

sentences.english: They also measure the time distribution of neutrinos arriving at Gran Sasso.
sentences.chinese: 他们还测量到达格兰萨索的中微子的时间分布。

sentences.english: Neutrinos are the only particles that seem to just spin anticlockwise.
sentences.chinese: 而中微子是唯一似乎只会逆时针旋转的微粒子。

sentences.english: These are also the only type of neutrino thought capable of escaping the brane.
sentences.chinese: 这些也是唯一类型的中微子，被认为可以从膜上逃脱。

sentences.english: If they are so stealthy, how do we know they are there at all?
sentences.chinese: 如果中微子那么隐秘，我们到底如何知道它们的存在？
是的，你没有听错，是中微子。

sentences.english: Faust’s tormented love, Gretchen, appeared as the fairylike neutrino.
sentences.chinese: 浮士德备受折磨的情人格雷琴就象精灵般的中微子。

sentences.english: Right-handed neutrino neutral current and right-handed charge current are predicted in this theory.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上予言了右手中微子流和右手荷电流的存在。

sentences.english: What are the fundamental symmetries and absolute mass of the neutrino ?
sentences.chinese: 什么是基本对称的绝对质量的中微子？

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 中微子[zhong1 wei1 zi3]
